question: Identify the first 5 users who asked questions that were tagged with 'graphql' and answered within the same month.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'graphql'})
WHERE q.answered = true
WITH u, q, date(q.createdAt) AS questionDate
WHERE questionDate.month = date().month AND questionDate.year = date().year
RETURN u.display_name AS userName, q.title AS questionTitle, q.createdAt AS questionDate
ORDER BY q.createdAt
LIMIT 5
error: Unsupported: date component extraction (month/year from datetime) required to filter questions answered within the same month

question: What are the first 5 questions with the longest text descriptions?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q.title, q.text
ORDER BY size(q.text) DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Unsupported: size() string length function needed for ORDER BY size(q.text)

question: What are the top 5 questions with the most complex text content?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WITH q, size(split(q.text, ' ')) AS wordCount
ORDER BY wordCount DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN q.title AS title, q.text AS text, wordCount
error: Cypher uses split() and size() for word counting, which are unsupported in TypeQL

question: What are the top 5 questions with the most external links mentioned in their text?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.text CONTAINS "http://" OR q.text CONTAINS "https://"
RETURN q.title, q.link, q.text, size(apoc.text.regexGroups(q.text, 'http[s]?://[^\\s]+')) AS link_count
ORDER BY link_count DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Unsupported: requires size() on regex group extraction (apoc.text.regexGroups) to count URL occurrences within a string. TypeQL has no string function to count pattern occurrences within an attribute value.

question: What are the top 5 questions with the shortest titles?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q.title, q.link
ORDER BY size(q.title) ASC
LIMIT 5
error: Unsupported: size() string length function has no TypeQL equivalent. Cannot sort by title length.

question: Identify the first 3 questions with the most detailed descriptions based on the number of characters.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WITH q, size(q.text) AS descriptionLength
ORDER BY descriptionLength DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN q.title AS title, q.text AS description, descriptionLength
error: Unsupported: size() string length function has no TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the top 5 questions with a creation time between 8:00 and 10:00 UTC?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE time(q.createdAt).hour >= 8 AND time(q.createdAt).hour < 10
RETURN q.title, q.createdAt
ORDER BY q.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Unsupported: TypeQL has no function to extract hour/time components from datetime values (date arithmetic)

question: What are the top 3 longest texts in questions on the platform?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q.text
ORDER BY size(q.text) DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Cypher uses size() for string length which is unsupported in TypeQL

question: Which questions have a text length greater than 500 characters?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE size(q.text) > 500
RETURN q.title, q.text, q.link
error: Unsupported feature: size() string length function has no TypeQL equivalent

question: Which questions have a text length greater than 500 characters?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE size(q.text) > 500
RETURN q.title AS title, q.text AS text, q.link AS link, q.createdAt AS createdAt
error: Unsupported: size() string length function has no TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the 3 questions with the most references to external links in their text?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.text CONTAINS "http://" OR q.text CONTAINS "https://"
RETURN q.title, q.link, q.text, size(apoc.text.regexGroups(q.text, 'http[s]?://[^\\s]+')) AS link_count
ORDER BY link_count DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Unsupported: size() on apoc.text.regexGroups() - counting regex pattern occurrences within a string has no TypeQL equivalent

question: Find the top 3 questions with the most complex text content.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WITH q, size(split(q.text, ' ')) AS wordCount
ORDER BY wordCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN q.title AS title, q.text AS text, wordCount
error: Unsupported features: size() and split() are not available in TypeQL. Cannot compute word count from text content.

question: What are the top 5 questions that were asked on a holiday (assuming holidays are January 1st, December 25th)?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE date(q.createdAt).month = 1 AND date(q.createdAt).day = 1
   OR date(q.createdAt).month = 12 AND date(q.createdAt).day = 25
RETURN q.title, q.link, q.createdAt, q.score
ORDER BY q.score DESC
LIMIT 5
error: TypeQL does not support date component extraction functions (month, day from datetime). Cannot filter by specific month/day values.

question: List the 3 questions with the most references to external links in their text.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.text CONTAINS "http://" OR q.text CONTAINS "https://"
RETURN q.title, q.text, q.link, size(apoc.text.regexGroups(q.text, 'http[s]?://[^\\s]+')) AS link_count
ORDER BY link_count DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Uses size() with apoc.text.regexGroups() to count URL occurrences - TypeQL has no regex counting or size() function
